name: Simple Dominoes
description:
Play the BEST dominoes game for Android today!

Enjoy the simple pleasures of this classic game on all of your Android devices. Play 3 classic game modes (Muggins, Block, and Draw) against a clever computer opponent. Custom themes and backgrounds round out this spectacular game.

• Muggins, Block, and Draw modes
• Up to 4 players
• Smart computer AIs
• Easy score-keeping and statistics
• 5 different domino styles and 3 game themes
